headline: Is Ball Offering Value After Portfolio Streamlining And Recent 9.6% Share Price Rebound?
summary: Wondering if Ball is quietly setting up as a value opportunity after a rough few years, or if the market is still pricing in too much risk? This article is going to walk you through that in plain English. Recently the stock has nudged higher, up 3.8% over the last week and 9.6% over the past month, even though it is still down 6.5% year to date and 11.2% over the last year. This suggests sentiment might be starting to turn but is not fully healed. That shift in mood comes as investors digest...
